name: Last Days of Atlantis (cortexcollider)
description:
(The web version of the game hangs for a few seconds after you hit "Play" because it's generating the island)

Controls:

  • WASD/Arrow Keys to control the camera
  • RMB to select & place buildings
  • LMB to cancel your current selection

Build up your economy, your population, and most importantly, your walls to fend off the oncoming tide! Win the game by successfully protecting your Shrine with walls and domes, but allow it to get washed away and it's all over!

Ludum Dare 51 Jam submission (couldn't get it done in time for the Compo...), theme: Every 10 Seconds.

Design, Art, Code, SFX & Music by @CrtxClldrCmrn
